short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple chrome extension to display update and other important notifications to Reservety customers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reservety – the all-in-one rental software platform. Stay always in touch with Reservety world class rental software.
With our extension get quick updates on Reservety features, upcoming news and updates. Always be in loop with latest happenings about the platform’s development and upcoming news. Be notified right on the desktop with instant notifications.
Reservety is universal rental software for a broad range of industries such as Property rental, automobile rental, bike rental, ski rental, bounce house rental, and many more such industries. With over thousands and hundreds of customers all over the globe, Reservety is always focused on updating resources to provide our clients the best experience and performance. We are working on providing robust, advanced, and cutting-edge features on our rental system. So, our client remains competent in the industry. Our most incredible features include Google calendar integration, Xero and Quickbooks integration, and Detrack integration. And, we are working on adding more amazing feature to the rental system. With all these features, any business would not need anything more to transform rental process.
What Kind of updates you will receive?
•	Be always first to know improvements with Reservety UI design
•	Updates on software and technology used by Reservety
•	Addition of additional cool features that will make rental process easy
•	Promotion and discounts on reservety rental subscription
•	Training and feature information about how to use them
While these are some of the updates, there would be ton of news about Reservety that you will get using this extension.
